dialogue:
[color=#b38b2b]Piper[/color] never talked about it, but... I think everyone disliked him for some reason. He always acted like he was fine with that. I can remember that a few days ago, we were having the most fun we've had in a while. It was the happiest I've ever seen him. 
He told me that he had a special surprise for me, and he couldn't wait for me to get it.
Then... he disappeared the next day.
I left [color=#b38b2b]Wonderland[/color] to go find him.
Did I do something wrong? All I can remember is how he was always saving me, but maybe he needed help too. Was I a bad friend?

I have to find him, not just for [color=#b38b2b]Wonderland[/color], but because of our friendship. 
[color=#b38b2b]Piper[/color]... you were the reason why I wanted to come home. You were important enough to me. Did I ever make you forget that?
